channel.description: Recent content in Page on open collector

item.title: Segger J-LINK SWD Breakout
item.description: Hello! If you’re looking for more information about the Segger J-Link Breakout, please visit the GitHub repository. Additionally, you might be interested in the OSHPark shared project.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m David. I also go by dave/davidk. I work on cloud tooling and cloud infrastructure (starting from bare metal on up), mostly tailored to all things Linux. This page is a collection of pointers to side projects, time permitting: mostly consisting of software, electronics and 3D printables. Software GitHub has a bunch of things i’ve written over the years. I have an interest in small embedded systems, so sometimes distributions and kernels that i’ve built end up there.
